alert.note: Alert for Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 6:38PM EDT until August 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Ulster County in east central New York... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 637 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Olivebridge, or 10 miles west of Kingston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kingston, Hurley, West Shokan, Lake Katrine, Tillson, Olivebridge, High Falls, Port Ewen, West Hurley, Rosendale, Marbletown, Rolling Meadows, Maple Hill, Palentown, Atwood, Pacama, Brodhead, Hillside, Stone Ridge and Morgan Hill. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
